channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rep. Barr to run for McConnell's Senate seat in GOP primary

item.title: Leader of Colombia says Trump admin revoked his US visa
item.description: The president of Colombia, Gustavo Petro, claimed in a cabinet meeting on Monday that the Trump administration revoked his travel visa.

item.title: ‘Don’t fight the Oval Office’: Investors are finally taking Trump seriously and it’s causing a volatility spike in markets as they try to figure out his next move
item.description: Volatility has plagued stocks in recent months and major indexes are down since Trump’s election in November.

item.title: Another Problem with Medicaid: It’s Pushing Women Toward Abortion
item.description: Directing federal dollars to prenatal care could result in a better long-term financial picture if it helps Americans more readily welcome children.

item.title: Forcing a Meta Breakup Would Be Bad News for Consumers

item.title: South Carolina’s Play To Nullify Tariffs In 1832 Failed Spectacularly. Newsom’s Will Too
item.description: Gavin Newsom is dusting off John C. Calhoun’s playbook from 1832, arguing his state can nullify federal law.

item.title: Markets open sharply higher after Trump softens on China and says he has ‘no intention to fire’ Fed Chair Jerome Powell
item.description: All major indices show substantial early gains.

item.title: Trump’s Next Target In Dismantling The Censorship Complex Is CISA
item.description: The legislative branch must codify the administration’s policies to ensure a speech policing apparatus does return under a future president.

item.title: IRS turmoil: Leadership churn, worker exodus and threats to groups' tax-exempt status roil agency
item.description: The height of tax season was the height of turmoil at the IRS. The agency shuffled through three acting directors over the course of a week.

item.description: Cory Bowman was feeling inspired in January as he headed home after watching his half brother, J.D. Vance, be inaugurated as vice president.

item.title: Elon Musk’s robotaxi could be its final all new EV: ‘The reality is in the future most people are not going to buy cars’
item.description: Tesla execs said new cars launching this year will just be more affordable derivatives of existing cars, dashing investor hopes for all new models.

item.title: Don’t Force Sex and Gender Ideology on Little Kids
